entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Elliot Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:53 a.m. EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 6.9Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gore Bay-Manitoulin Airport 9:00 AM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 6.9°C
Pressure: 100.6 kPa
Visibility: 13 km
Humidity: 95 %
Dewpoint: 6.2°C
Wind: ESE 21 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of rain. High 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers early this morning. Periods of rain beginning this morning. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h. High 9. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 6:19 AM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers late this evening and after midnight. A few showers beginning after midnight. Fog patches developing this evening. Amount 5 mm. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 6:19 AM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few showers ending in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers late in the morning and early afternoon. A few showers beginning in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Amount 5 mm. High 10. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:19 AM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023
